        public static String[] parseFullModuleName​(String fullModuleName)
        A full module name contains module name and instance. Parse them to a string array.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A one or two entry String array holind the module name and, if present, the instance name.

        public static String getModuleAdminTopicName​(String modeName,
                                             String fullModuleName)
        Return a consistent way of naming the admin topic for the supplied module. This topic only exists for the module as a while, not the individual instances.
        Returns:
        The topicName for this combination of mode and module

      • getVariableKeyName

        public static String getVariableKeyName​(String variableName)
        Given a variable name and an variable (not module) instance name (or null if not an array), construct a key to be used in the module state topic.
        Parameters:
        variableName -
        variableInstance -
        Returns:
        String suitable for use in the key of a variable.

        Returns:
